title: Rates
text: We believe in being flexible and tailoring our practices and services to each individual event; and thatâ€™s reflected by our rates. PartySafe Medics operates on sliding scale fees based on the duration of the event and size of the gathering; For small businesses, we offer an hourly sliding-scale option between $25/hr-$40/hr.  For mutual aid groups, creative collectives, and pop-ups, our lowered rates are $0/hr-$20/hr.  For questions or information on our rates, please email us at partysafemedics@gmail.com, or DM our Instagram @PartySafeMedics.
